```{r LoadData, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
Stations <- mosaic::read.file("http://tiny.cc/dcf/DC-Stations.csv")
data_site <- "http://tiny.cc/dcf/2014-Q4-Trips-History-Data-Small.rds"
data_sitefull <- "http://tiny.cc/dcf/2014-Q4-Trips-History-Data.rds"
Trips <- readRDS(gzcon(url(data_site)))
TripsFull <- readRDS(gzcon(url(data_sitefull)))
```

####A1 - How long?
```{r A1}
#create duration variable edate - sdate
dur60 <- (as.numeric(Trips$edate - Trips$sdate))/60
Trips$dur60 <- dur60
boxplot(dur60 ~ client, data = Trips, 
        main = "Bike Rental Durations",
        xlab = "Client", ylab = "Duration/60",
        outline = FALSE, range = 2)
```

####A2 - When are bikes used?
```{r A2}
hist(Trips$sdate, "days", col="grey",
     main = "Histogram of Checkout by Day")
hist(Trips$sdate, "weeks", col="grey",
     main = "Histogram of Checkout by Weeks")
hist(Trips$sdate, "hour", col="grey",
     main = "Histogram of Checkout by Hour")
hist(Trips$sdate, "mins", col="grey",
     main = "Histogram of Checkout by Mins")
hist(lubridate::hour(Trips$sdate))
hist(lubridate::yday(Trips$sdate))
hist(lubridate::wday(Trips$sdate))
```
